title: Add User Profile Avatar Upload Functionality
description: Enable users to upload and manage their profile avatar images to personalize their account and improve user experience.
iWant: to upload and set a custom avatar image for my profile
soThat: I can personalize my account and be easily recognized by other users

acceptanceTests.title: Avatar Upload Success
given: User has a valid image file (JPG, PNG, GIF) under 5MB
when: User selects image file from device
then: New avatar is displayed in profile

acceptanceTests.title: Invalid File Rejection
when: User attempts to upload invalid file (wrong format or too large)
then: Clear error message explains the issue
Supported formats and size limits are displayed
